item.title: 박재범,Hit-Boy - K-TOWN
item.description:
Pulling up
in K-town
Yeah I’m feeling
like the president
U an outsider why U
actin’ like a resident
I get
all this money
Sxxx is lookin’
like embezzlement
I get
all this money
Lookin’ like
I got a settlement
Karaoke room
turned strip club
Poppin’ soju bottles
homie drink up
We them K-town riders
never get stuck
It’s on lock
when we slide
Like
a Brinks truck
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down
Cocaine
Bentley
I don’t never even
drive it
Supermodels next to me
I ain’t even excited
Oriental features man
she looking so exotic
Couple soju bottles
tell U
It’s gon’ be
a problem
This sxxx a mood
this sxxx a vibe
Turn off the sign
party all night
This sxxx a mood
this sxxx a vibe
Keeping it live
keeping it live
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down
K-town bust it down

like the president
